channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Washington Post confirms data breach linked to Oracle hacks
item.description: The Washington Post is the latest victim of a hacking campaign by the notorious Clop ransomware gang, which relied on vulnerabilities in Oracle software used by many corporations.

item.title: The massive Currys Black Friday sale is here – I've picked the 19 best deals on TVs, appliances, laptops, headphones, and more
item.description: I've searched through the Curry Black Friday sale and hand-picked 19 of the best deals that I'd buy on TVs, appliances, laptops, headphones, and more.

item.title: Dan Trachtenberg on Why He Wants to Continue Making ‘Predator’ Movies
item.description: The director's third 'Predator' movie, 'Predator: Badlands,' is now in theaters.

item.title: Cornell University Will Pay $60 Million to Unlock Research Funds Frozen by White House
item.description: The administration has come after researchers at institutions across the country.

item.title: Welcome to Big Tech's ‘Age of Extraction’
item.description: In his new book, antitrust scholar and former White House adviser Tim Wu argues that tech giants are bleeding you dry—and lays out a plan to stop them.

item.title: How to watch Grand Slam of Darts 2025 online: live streams, schedule
item.description: As the world's best players head to Wolverhampton, here's how to watch Grand Slam of Darts 2025 live streams online from anywhere in the world.

item.title: These VPN deals blew us away over the last few years – will they be beaten in 2025?
item.description: After tracking VPN deals for years, I know how to spot a real VPN deal.

item.title: Blackmagic’s free camera app can now stream directly to YouTube and Twitch
item.description: Blackmagic released an update to its free camera app with some new features that streamers and professional broadcasters will appreciate. Both the Android and iOS versions of the Blackmagic Camera app can now stream directly to YouTube, Twitch, and Vimeo, removing the need for third-party apps or additional encoding hardware. You just need to select […]...

item.title: I tried the Apple Crossbody Strap. It’s convenient, but the phone looks silly when the strap is removed.
item.description: Apple's new Crossbody Strap is a convenient way to go hands-free but the strap can rub uncomfortably at times, and the phone looks silly when the strap is removed.

item.title: Social Security Employees Grill Management During Tense Shutdown Meeting
item.description: WIRED obtained notes from a Social Security Administration management meeting, where employees pressed leadership on plans for the agency.

item.title: Linda Hamilton Was Considering Retirement Before ‘Stranger Things’ Came Along
item.description: The sci-fi legend takes on a villainous role in the Netflix show's fifth and final season.

item.title: Anker’s 521 PowerHouse can power up to six devices, and it’s on sale
item.description: From weekend camping trips to unexpected power outages, having a reliable power source like the Anker 521 PowerHouse can be a lifesaver. Normally $249.99, right now you can buy the power station for the new low price of $128.99 at checkout at Amazon. The power station is essentially a portable backup battery with a 256Wh […]

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, les configurations recommandées annoncées sur PC
item.description: Call of Duty revient encore une fois avec un septième opus "Black Ops". La franchise va-t-elle parvenir à se réinventer ? Et surtout, devrez-vous, de votre côté, réinventer votre tour gaming pour pouvoir y jouer ?

item.title: Malicious AI-made extension with ransomware capabilities sneaks on to Microsoft's official VS Code marketplace - so devs beware
item.description: Malicious VS Code extension stuck around for a little while, but it is now removed.

item.title: Don’t wait for Black Friday: Get Crucial’s 2TB P310 Gen4 SSD with 7,100MB/s read speeds for just £105.99
item.description: The 2TB Crucial P310 SSD delivers PCIe Gen4 performance with read speeds of up to 7,100MB/s, and it’s currently priced at just £105.99 ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: Steam store pages are wider now
item.description: Valve is making Steam store pages wider as part of a new update rolling out today. With the changes, “many pages” will be widened from “940 pixels to now 1200 pixels,” Valve says. The company picked that 1200 pixels number because it found that it “felt like a good balance where we can show more […]

item.title: Gemini sait maintenant farfouiller dans les emails et les documents persos pour faire des recherches approfondies
item.description: Les fonctions de recherche approfondie des bots IA peuvent générer des rapports à partir de ce qu'ils piochent sur internet. Cela peut être utile dans de nombreux cas, mais ces agents sont également en mesure de farfouiller dans des documents personnels afin de réaliser des analyses personnalisées. C'est désormais le cas de Gemini.

item.title: 20 More Lego ‘Star Trek’ Sets I Want After the ‘Enterprise’-D
item.description: Sure, $400 starships are nice, but Lego 'Star Trek' could be so much more than pricey ships of the line.

item.title: Acheter un smartphone aux États-Unis : pourquoi le DG de Save vous le déconseille fortement
item.description: Acheter un smartphone à l'étranger, quoi de plus normal si on peut faire quelques économies, mais ça peut aussi être dangereux.

item.title: Texas sues Roblox for allegedly failing to protect children on its platform
item.description: Texas AG Ken Paxton is accusing Roblox of “putting pixel pedophiles and profits over the safety of Texas children,” alleging in a lawsuit filed this week that it is “flagrantly ignoring state and federal online safety laws while deceiving parents about the dangers of its platform.” The lawsuit accuses Roblox of deceptive trade practices for […]

item.title: BioWare says it’s ‘focused exclusively’ on the next Mass Effect
item.description: It’s been five years since BioWare first announced it was working on a brand new Mass Effect game. But today, November 7th (N7 Day), BioWare shared a promising sign of life: the BioWare team is “heads-down and focused exclusively” on the game, according to its executive producer. “We have a lot of universe to cover, […]

item.title: Texas AG sues Roblox for putting pixel pedophiles and profits over safety
item.description: Texas has become the latest state to sue Roblox over child safety concerns.

item.title: Galaxy SmartTag 2 : la balise Bluetooth pas chère de Samsung chute sous les 15 € lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Si vous avez la désagréable habitude de perdre vos clés ou votre portefeuille chaque jour, vous devriez opter pour un porte-clé connecté, comme le Samsung Galaxy SmartTag 2, qui va vous sortir du pétrin rapidement. Et justement, cette balise est proposée à 14,99 euros au lieu de 39,90 euros chez PC Componentes en plein pré-Black Friday.

item.title: This years hottest gift is the Lego U.S.S. Enterprise — coming Nov. 28
item.description: The hottest gift of 2025? The Lego U.S.S. Enterprise set. It's a 3,600 piece set included mini-figurines of Jean-Luc Picard, William Riker, Data, and more.

item.title: Design.com logo maker review
item.description: When looking for design services, why not point your browser to the best URL on the planet for this purpose: design.com. But is what it offers as cool as its name?

item.title: The ‘Mass Effect’ TV Show Will Tackle What Happens After the Original Trilogy
item.description: Amazon's 'Mass Effect' series is going to be diving into some incredibly tempting waters... for better or worse.
